blank1_info = | website = | footnotes = | name = Nishapur }} Nishapur is a historial city in northeast Iran and the cultural capital of the Khorasan region. In 2005, about 270,940 people lived there.Cities in Iran == References == Category:Cities in Iran Category:Razavi Khorasan Province
